entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When using Hot Reload endpoints get duplicated #44857
  • OIDC NonceCookie/CorrelationCookie not accepted by latest Chrome/Edge in some cases #44853
  • SystemTextJsonOutputFormatter calls the serializer with unexpected Type #44852
  • QuickGrid Sorting - JSON Parsing Error #44851
  • Convenience methods for adding well-known limiter types with more fine grained keys #44850
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Extra config not available in IHosting startup classes #44847
  • Compiler warning when StateHasChanged is called from OnAfterRender #44846
  • Default Blazor WASM project should not produce trim warnings #44845
  • Blazor: Inconsistent Build Error RZ9985 #44844
  • Mainlayout Page prevents the responsive table rendering when element has 100% width #44840
  • ERROR java.security.cert.CertificateException: java.security.cert.CertPathValidatorException: Trust anchor for certification path not found #44837
  • Blazor WebAssembly Msal TryAddAdditionalParameter("prompt", "select_account") does nothing #44854
  • Referencing Blazor WASM project from Server project with Blazor Server breaks hot-reload #44833
  • [Epic]: Support returning values from client invocations #44831
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • [Epic]: Support returning values from client invocations #5280
    7.0.0
  • [Epic]: Rate/Resource Limiting #37380
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Make Kestrel prefer on-disk cert for macOS bind. #44856
  • Clarify some comments on RateLimiterOptionsExtensions #44855
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Produce arch-specific ANCM redist packages #44849
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Produce arch-specific ANCM redist packages #44848
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure
  • source-build: don't use crossgen when building for mono runtime. #44842
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Make Kestrel prefer on-disk cert for macOS bind. #44835
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
  • Add transport selector interface to Kestrel sockets and QUIC transports #44832
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update for more accessible colors in dev exception page #44798
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Produce arch-specific ANCM redist packages #44647
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Fix components-e2e pipeline #44530
    tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Send 431 when HTTP/2&3 headers are too large or many #33622 #44771
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Get rid of IsPublicRuntime, use AdditionalDotNetPackageFeed #44605
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.12
  • [Templates] Fix links to http://useiconic.com #44801
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Backport 'Fix Blazor RemoteAuthenticatorView processing the same action multiple times' #44718
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.12
  • [6.0] Limit the hpack buffer resize #44645
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.12
  • [6.0] Remove IsAvailable check on CommitAsync. #44610
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building aspnetcore using non-portable runtime packages (backport #43937) #44752
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `3026483` #44816
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Add CodeQL3000 run to aspnetcore-ci-official #44719
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.12
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `3026483` #44814
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.32
  • [release/3.1] Update Grpc.AspNetCore dependency for template #44621
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 3.1.32
  • [release/3.1] Skip test that times out in CI #44602
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 3.1.32

Updated

  • Update branding to 7.0.1 #44768
    area-infrastructure
  • Set ApiParameterDescription.Type to `string` for Simple Types #44747
    area-web-frameworks
  • Initial Form-binding support #44653
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2035489 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation #44523
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.1
  • [release/7.0] Fixing XML documentation issues for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results' methods #44488
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.1
  • Remove premature QuicListener.IsSupported check #44755
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
  • Experiment with named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime
